overview: "Curse Revealed 20 Years Later" In the late Showa period, the contributor's mother, who was suffering from illness, left a video that could be called a suicide note, but a surprising message was hidden in it. It may have been her mother's curse suggesting a tragedy that happened five years in the future, about 16 years ago, from the shooting of her suicide note video.
tagline: It is a video that reflects an absolutely scary vengeful spirit.
title: Horror Vengeful Ghost Video
